vocabinfos.mediumDef:
firstborn, firstling, that which separates or first opens
Also means: pit.rah (פִּטְרָה "firstborn" H6363B)
§ firstborn, firstling, that which separates or first opens
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition: 頭生的, 分別出來的
vocabinfos._zh_Definition: 头生的, 分别出来的
